sentences.sContent: We refuse to talk to terrorists.
sentences.sCn: 我们拒绝和恐怖分子对话。

sentences.sContent: a terrorist bomb that left 168 people dead
sentences.sCn: 恐怖分子引爆造成168人死亡的炸弹

sentences.sContent: ...If we do not see that after recent terrorist attacks on the streets of Boston and London...
...What is the author's purpose in citing the recent terrorist attacks on the streets of Boston and London...

words.tran: 恐怖；恐怖行动；恐怖时期；可怕的人
恐怖主义；恐怖行动；恐怖统治

trans.tranOther: someone who uses violence such as bombing, shooting etc to obtain political demands
